## About Paste
Paste revolutionizes the traditional clipboard by providing a sophisticated yet intuitive management system that remembers everything you copy. Unlike basic clipboard utilities, Paste offers visual previews of all copied content including text, images, links, and files, making it easy to identify and reuse previously copied items. The application runs seamlessly in the background, automatically organizing your clipboard history while maintaining system performance and responsiveness.

The desktop application delivers a consistent experience across both macOS and Windows platforms, featuring iCloud and cross-device synchronization to keep your clipboard history available on all your computers. With support for keyboard shortcuts, drag-and-drop functionality, and customizable collections, Paste enhances productivity by eliminating the need to recopy information and reducing context switching between applications. The smart filtering system and pinning capability ensure that your most important clips remain easily accessible for frequent use.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   200 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   200 MB of available storage space
